articles.author: Silvia Recchimuzzi
articles.title: World chess champion alleges teenage rival has cheated more than he admits - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: World champion Magnus Carlsen has broken his silence about why he resigned after just one move in his game last week against 19-year-old American Hans Niemann.
articles.content: Gdask: World chess champion Magnus Carlsen said he believed Hans Niemann had cheated more - and more recently - than he has publicly admitted, adding he no longer wanted to play against the American … [+1373 chars]
